provider.selectSQL: SELECT s.oSheetNumber, s.fuelId, f.fuelName, s.groupAccId, g.groupAccCode, g.groupAccName, CASE s.sheetState WHEN 1 THEN 'закрыта' ELSE ' ' END sheetState, sum(quantity) quantity FROM otherRefuellingSheets s INNER JOIN otherRefuelling r ON s.oSheetNumber=r.oSheetNumber AND s.fuelId=r.fuelId AND s.groupAccId=r.groupAccId LEFT JOIN groupAcc g ON g.groupAccId = s.groupAccId LEFT JOIN fuel f ON f.fuelId = s.fuelId WHERE s.fuelId = {_fuelId} AND s.groupAccId = {_groupAccId} AND s.oSheetNumber = {_oSheetNumber} GROUP BY s.oSheetNumber, s.fuelId, f.fuelName, s.groupAccId, g.groupAccCode, g.groupAccName, s.sheetState
